sentence.text: Before performing PET scans, subjects answered the Buss-Perry Aggression Questionnaire and Temperament and Character Inventory to measure their aggression and personality negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, respectively.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Females showed associations between androgen catabolic process levels in subcortical regions, such as the amygdala and supraoptic nucleus of the hypothalamus, and personality traits such as aggression, novelty seeking, and self-transcendence.
